predicate.note: Frames file for 'cake' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to cover or fill with a thick layer

example.name: transitive
example.text: The water destroyed about $ 75 million [*U*] in currency and caked $ 4 million [*U*] of coins with mud , [*] rendering them dangerous to counting machines .
example.arg: [*] rendering them dangerous to counting machines
